snippet: Since his return from a seven-month layoff because of a knee injury, Rafael Nadal has been particularly outspoken on the detrimental effects of hardcourt proliferation.
abstract: Rafael Nadal has been particularly outspoken on detrimental effects of hardcourt since returning from seven-month layoff because of knee injury; asserts that proliferation of hardcourt events is shortening careers of tennis players.
lead_paragraph: Since his return from a seven-month layoff because of a knee injury, Rafael Nadal has been particularly outspoken on the detrimental effects of hardcourt proliferation.

headline.seo: Rafael Nadal Renews Criticism of Hardcourt Schedule
headline.main: Nadal Renews Criticism of Hardcourt Schedule
headline.print_headline: Nadal Renews Criticism of Hardcourt Schedule
